name: Polarity (itch) (The_Hat_Guy, Escarlate92)
description:
Game made for a Game Jam in one week.

Controls:

A -> move left

D -> move right

SPACE -> jump

LEFT SHIFT or LMB -> swap polarity

ESC -> pause

Credits:

João Escarlate -> Game Design

Rafael Braga -> Programming

Ian Geraldi -> Music and SFX

Beatriz Orfaliais -> Music and SFX

Luna Cassinelli -> Art
